name: xiaoii
description: 小爱音箱语音通知工具 - CLI + TUI + MCP Server
author: ius

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const os=require('os');const path=require('path');const home=process.env.USERPROFILE||process.env.HOME||os.homedir(); if(!home) process.exit(0); const dir=path.join(home,'.xiaoi'); const cfg=path.join(dir,'config.json'); try{fs.mkdirSync(dir,{recursive:true});}catch(e){}; try{if(!fs.existsSync(cfg)){fs.writeFileSync(cfg, JSON.stringify({speaker:{userId:'',password:'',passToken:'',did:''},webhook:{port:3088,host:'localhost',token:'',logFile:'log/webhook.log'},mcp:{logFile:'log/mcp_server.log'}}, null, 4), 'utf-8');}}catch(e){}"
